body: Why fap beat the shit out of the guy

That was actually really good. At least I really enjoyed it in a  strange sort of vanilla+NTR way. I just wish they had told us what happened with the older brother since it seemed like the beating he got was pretty serious and his misdeeds were well known. Hmm.

Even i don't like this
But loved the thing mc did at the end
HEROE ESE MEN CSMR LE SACO LA CSMR AL HUEVON DE SU HERMANO.

@Hentai97 I totally agree with you
@Troncol You too

I just got to see one of the best endings in nhentai. :'-)
Needless to say that the story is just great, I feel so satisfied to see the cucked boi man up and beat up the rapist; even though it's his own brother! 🔥
And then the ending, ahh❤️
This one is in my top favourite now.
This isn't Ntr. This was just straight up rape.
Best End. Now we have a story with closure.

Some grown protagonist from other titles need to learn from this kid... some authors needs to learn from this one this ending didn’t negate the NTR factor and the protagonist did what any person would have done in his/her power to a scumbag like the one in this story even if they were family. It is refreshing to see a different kind of end for the scumbag than the traditional I'm untouchable because the plot demand it...
Can't really call it NTR when the girl never really enjoyed it/caved to the rapist and chose him over the MC, and doubly so when the MC beat the shit out of him in revenge instead of accepting it.
Me gusto la golpiza para el violador
Mmmmmmmmmm estos si que son buenos amigos ;)
